import { formatSelectOptions } from '@superset-ui/chart-controls';
import { SLOW_DEBOUNCE, t } from '@superset-ui/core';
export const PAGE_SIZE_OPTIONS = formatSelectOptions([
[0, t('page_size.all')],
1,
2,
3,
4,
5,
10,
20,
50,
100,
200]
);
export const debounceFunc = _debounce((func, source) => func(source), SLOW_DEBOUNCE);
